caption: The photograph features a close-up view of a cluster of vibrant pink flowers, each with five delicate petals. The flowers are arranged around a dark central core from which several slender, green leaves protrude, adding contrast to the deep pink petals. The background is softly blurred, using a shallow depth of field which highlights the flowers in the foreground. The out-of-focus areas contain hues of earthy browns and hints of green, suggesting a natural, outdoor setting. The lighting in the image subtly enhances the texture of the petals and the overall serene mood of the composition.
title: Iron weed in bloom in the Texas countryside, near San Antonio
